com.SocScore.framework.scorekeeper

Class BatchInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.SocScore.framework.AnalysisViewer
      • com.SocScore.framework.scorekeeper.ScoreKeeper
        • com.SocScore.framework.scorekeeper.BatchInput

  • public class BatchInput
extends ScoreKeeper
    Object which manages creating, editing, and saving of matches in a batch context. Also allows to edit matches stored in LeagueAnalysis (i.e. matches which have already happened)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.SocScore.framework.scorekeeper.ScoreKeeper

        currentMatch, hasUnsavedMatches, MATCHES

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BatchInput() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAllMatchesToLeague()
      Saves (Match.updateScore()) and then adds all matches to LeagueAnalysis, and removes them from ScoreKeeper.MATCHES.
      void createMatch(Team team1, Team team2, org.joda.time.LocalDateTime startTime, org.joda.time.LocalDateTime endTime)
      creates a new match and adds it to ScoreKeeper.MATCHES.
      void loadMatchFromLeague(int ID)
      Allows to load a match from LeagueAnalysis, add it to ScoreKeeper.MATCHES, set it as ScoreKeeper.currentMatch and edit it.

      Updates ScoreKeeper.currentMatch with the appropriate fields

    • Method Detail

      • createMatch

        public void createMatch(Team team1,
               Team team2,
               org.joda.time.LocalDateTime startTime,
               org.joda.time.LocalDateTime endTime)
                 throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        creates a new match and adds it to ScoreKeeper.MATCHES. It also assigns this newly created match to ScoreKeeper.currentMatch
        Parameters:
        team1 - First team to add to match.
        team2 - Second team to add to match.
        startTime - Start time of the match.
        endTime - End time of the match.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - Thrown if either of the teams are null, or if the teams are identical.
        See Also:
        Match.Match(Team, Team, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime)

      • saveMatch

        public void saveMatch()
        Updates ScoreKeeper.currentMatch with the appropriate fields
        See Also:
        Match.updateScore()

      • addAllMatchesToLeague

        public void addAllMatchesToLeague()
        Saves (Match.updateScore()) and then adds all matches to LeagueAnalysis, and removes them from ScoreKeeper.MATCHES.

      • loadMatchFromLeague

        public void loadMatchFromLeague(int ID)
        Allows to load a match from LeagueAnalysis, add it to ScoreKeeper.MATCHES, set it as ScoreKeeper.currentMatch and edit it.
        Parameters:
        ID - The ID of the match being loaded.
